short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Home of Aeterna Utilities on the Web and beyond.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The official Aeterna web extension for Aeterna Utilities on the Web and beyond! 

The Extension allows a user to securely create or restore  a Aeterna chain based wallet on their browser locally with a friendly registration or restoration process. A user can then view assets balances and use their wallet to stake their crypto assets on the Aeterna chain.

This makes interacting with the Aeterna smart contracts much easier for a user by abstracting to a nice easy user interface in a self custodial browser extension.
